author: aconway
msg: Fix valgrind on unit tests: missing symbols for dynamically unloaded libs.
Interposed library supresses dlclose so symbols are reported.

msg: Adding NOTICES.txt and LICENSE.txt to META-INF directory.  The previous attempt failed to add resource.properties which then caused JAXWSTest to fail.

msg: XML-RPC now will accept un-named services parmeters in order which they appear in the servicedef
